```{r setup}
library(andorR)
# load a tree
dtree <- load_tree_df(ethical)

# calculate the optimisation indices
dtree <- update_tree(dtree)

# examine the optimisation indices
options(width = 120)
print(dtree, "rule", "true_index", "false_index", influence = "influence_index")
```
